cause.description:
1 CAR AVERAGE SPEED OF 25MPH. TRAVELLING FROM THE CASTELL HOTEL TO CASH GENERATOR. PASSENGER WINDOWS DOWN. EGG YOUR ARMS UP READY. TARGET DAI DATE. AIM,FIRE!!!! BANG DAI'S DOWN. MISSION COMPLETE.
1. WISE HIM UP!
2. PISS MOGGSIE OFF!
3. FUCKING GOOD LAUGH!!!!
cause.mission: EGG DAI DATE OUTSIDE THE WYNDAM
cause.name: THE EGG BANDITS
